EmperorAD_AntechamberWarning.synopsis: In the Wyrmway, in the antechamber to Ansur's lair, the Emperor will say this line as a warning to the player.

CentralPlatform_AD.synopsis: One of the central statues issues the first challenge to a player arriving in the centre

Mural_PAD.synopsis: The party clicks on the first Mural in the wyrmway: Balduran meeting Ansur the Bronze Dragon during his seafaring adventure and starting to befriend him.
Mural_PAD.how_to_trigger: Click on the first Mural in the wyrmway

AD_DoorBlocked.synopsis: The player has clicked the door, but not all trials are done yet.

PAD_UndeadHint.synopsis: Players have noticed claw marks on the side of a platform and are trying to figure out what happened.

Mural3_PAD.synopsis: The party clicks on the third Mural in the wyrmway: Balduran leaving on his boat for a new adventure, leaving Ansur to keep watch in his brand new dungeon
Mural3_PAD.how_to_trigger: Click on the third Mural in the wyrmway

PAD_Arrival.synopsis: The players have a first look at the cavernous expanse of Ansur's lair.

Mural2_PAD.synopsis: The party clicks on the second Mural in the wyrmway: Balduran and Ansur, now fast-friends, looking over Baldur’s Gate together.
Mural2_PAD.how_to_trigger: Click on the second Mural in the wyrmway

EmperorAD_AntechamberWarning_0.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
EmperorAD_AntechamberWarning_0.text: Turn back. You must trust me. Beyond this door lies death.

CentralPlatform_AD_1.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_WyrmwayAnnouncer
CentralPlatform_AD_1.text: Face my tests. Prove your worth.

CentralPlatform_AD_2.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_WyrmwayAnnouncer
CentralPlatform_AD_2.text: Face my tests. Prove your worth.

Mural_PAD_0.speaker: Player
Mural_PAD_0.text: Incredible. An elf and a bronze dragon - allies at sea.

Mural_PAD_1.speaker: Player
Mural_PAD_1.text: An elf sailor and a dragon - quite friendly, by the looks of it.

AD_DoorBlocked_0.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_WyrmwayAnnouncer
AD_DoorBlocked_0.text: Prove your worth to the Heart of the Gate. Only then may you enter.

PAD_UndeadHint_0.speaker: Player
PAD_UndeadHint_0.text: |Claw marks. I think something came up here.|

PAD_UndeadHint_1.speaker: Player
PAD_UndeadHint_1.text: |Ghoul tracks, like the ones that attacked Isobel. Be on alert.|

Mural3_PAD_0.speaker: Player
Mural3_PAD_0.text: Balduran sails away and leaves the dragon to watch over his city. Do the histories make mention of this?

Mural3_PAD_1.speaker: Player
Mural3_PAD_1.text: The elf is sailing away, leaving a dragon looking over Baldur's Gate. Do the histories make mention of it?

PAD_Arrival_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Arrival_0.text: Two centuries walking the streets and I never knew this was under them. What other wonders have I missed...

PAD_Arrival_1.speaker: Player
PAD_Arrival_1.text: Incredible. How old is this place?

Mural2_PAD_0.speaker: Player
Mural2_PAD_0.text: Balduran and his winged ally admiring the fruits of their labour - the city itself.

Mural2_PAD_1.speaker: Player
Mural2_PAD_1.text: A stunning vista - a dragon and elf surveying the city of Baldur's Gate.
